field.label: Storage Provider
field.help: Storage provider to use for syncing configuration data.

field.label: Endpoint URL Override
field.help: Manually provide (or override) the URL endpoint used by the Storage Provider.

field.label: Storage Bucket
field.help: Storage provider bucket name to be used. The storage-bucket must exist prior to use, the Configuration Sync feature will not attempt to create the bucket for you.

field.label: Storage Path
field.help: The base storage-path used to sync configuration data to. The Configuration Sync feature will create the required storage-path if API key has permissions to do so. It is recommended that you consider applying policy to the API Key that restricts access within the bucket to this storage-path only.

field.label: API Key
field.help: Storage provider API key. Consider applying a storage-provider policy to this key that only permits ListBucket and PutObject operations within the storage-bucket and storage-path.

field.label: API Secret
field.help: Storage provider secret value associated with the API Key.

field.label: System Host Id
field.help: The System Host Id is generated by the underlying FreeBSD operating-system and is found in the file /etc/hostid on the OPNsense system. This value is added as meta-data to files written to the storage-provider which provides a way to confirm the source system of those files.
